page.title: 04Holiday Season
page.content: The camp covers 110 acres of land.It opens in early March and closes on October 31st.The camp is busiest the last 2 weeks in June and the whole of July and August.Visitors mainly come from Scotland,Yorkshire,North East England and Merseyside.There is entertainment each night for all ages, a theatre for adults which seats a 1000 and a childrens theatre which seats 900.During wet days cartoons are shown and at night films are shown. There is one main car park on the camp.The swimming pool has a 150 foot water shoot.There is a "puffertrain" which will take you all over the camp.Childrens activities include a playorama,sandpit,paddling pool and swimming pool.Altogether there are 16 leisure camps around the British Coast run by this Company.
